name: Crescent Technology Ventures
overview: Crescent Technology Ventures Plc is a public investment firm that specializes in investments in private companies involved in developing security technologies. The firm typically invests in companies developing technology that will protect internet- based communications or identify dangerous materials in air and sea cargo containers. It also seeks to invest in companies involved in the development of stratospheric airships that can provide an alternative to satellite-based telecommunications. The firm prefers investments in continental European and the United States. Crescent Technology Ventures typically acquires stakes of up to 30 per cent. The firm is based in London, United Kingdom.
